QuestData.Title: Moving On
QuestData.Description: Your journey in this land has already proven most eventful, traveler. And mine, it appears, is destined to continue for a time.$b$bA chain of events began when your people arrived here, and while some of those happenings are traumatic to behold, I feel there must be a larger purpose behind your presence.$b$bFor now it is wisest that you leave this place and explore Pandaria's other regions.$b$bSpeak to me when you are ready to leave.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Fei and travel to Valley of the Four Winds.
QuestData.RewardText: Be wise, traveler.$b$bProve to these inhabitants that there is more to your people than war and destruction.

Objectives.Objective: Traveled to Valley of the Four Winds
